name: Peace, Death!
description: Peace, Death! is an arcade simulator with difficulties. In this game you play as the Reaper working for your boss, Death, and send clients to Heaven, Hell, or Purgatory.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and above Processor: Intel Pentium 2.9 Ghz or equivalent Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 512 Mb DirectX 9 compatible video card with shader model 3.0 support DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 100 MB available space Additional Notes: Mouse + Keyboard
recommended_requirements: Memory: 2048 MB RAM Additional Notes: Sense of humor
